properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 9 at 10:58AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois...

Kankakee River at Dunns Bridge affecting Porter County
Kankakee River near Kouts affecting Jasper and Porter Counties
Kankakee River at Shelby affecting Lake and Newton Counties
Kankakee River at Momence affecting Kankakee County
Kankakee River near Wilmington affecting Grundy...Kankakee and Will
Counties

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 72 hours into the future.

The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Kankakee River at Dunns Bridge, or from US-421 south of La
Crosse downstream to IN-49 south of Kouts.
* from Monday morning until further notice.
* At 1000 AM Thursday the stage was 5.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 10.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast. Moderate flooding is possible.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Monday morning and continue to
rise to near 12 feet by Thursday morning. Additional rises are
possible thereafter.
* Impact...At 12.0 feet...Secondary roads near the river flood.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...If you encounter a flooded roadway...turn around and
find an alternate route.

Additional information can be found at weather.gov/chicago.
